meanings.definition: The act of paying taxes to the government.
meanings.sent1: Every April, citizens engage in taxpayings to fulfill their civic duty.
meanings.sent2: Taxpayings are necessary to fund public services like schools and roads.
meanings.sent3: The annual ritual of taxpayings always reminds me of my responsibilities as a citizen.
meanings.sent4: In a society, taxpayings are like the lifeblood that keeps the government functioning.
meanings.sent5: The concept of taxpayings is ingrained in our society as a way to contribute to the common good.

meanings.definition: The individuals or entities who pay taxes to the government.
meanings.sent1: Many taxpayings were concerned about the new tax laws affecting their finances.
meanings.sent2: The government relies on taxpayings to generate revenue for public projects.
meanings.sent3: A group of taxpayings walked into the tax office, looking slightly overwhelmed.
meanings.sent4: In the eyes of the government, taxpayings are the backbone of the economy.
meanings.sent5: The responsibility of taxpayings is crucial for the functioning of public services.
